summary: This bill, the Enhancing Stakeholder Support and Outreach for Preparedness Grants Act, amends the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to improve outreach and technical assistance for the Urban Area Security Initiative and the State Homeland Security Grant Program. It mandates the Administrator of FEMA to conduct stakeholder surveys, provide summaries of feedback, and explore other feedback mechanisms. The Comptroller General is required to report on outreach effectiveness within two years of enactment, and FEMA must submit a report on actions taken within three years.
